[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”50px” header_line_height=”1.6em” text_orientation=”center” width=”58%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center”]

Shipping Policy

We have flat rates on shipping, depending where you are located

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||60px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”50px” header_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center”]

Fresh Flowers

A flat rate of $45 applies for shipping

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”British Columbia” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#FAF7F2″ use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#F9BAA9″ icon_placement=”left” content_max_width_tablet=”” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_blurb_content=”font-weight: 400;” locked=”off”]

Lower Mainland, Greater Victoria, Greater Nanaimo, Shuswap, Kamloops, Okanagan, and Larger centres in the Kootenays

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Alberta” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#FAF7F2″ use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#F9BAA9″ icon_placement=”left” content_max_width_tablet=”” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_blurb_content=”font-weight: 400;” locked=”off”]Greater Edmonton – Includes Spruce Grove and St. Albert
Calgary – Includes Cochrane, Chestermer, Airdrie, and Okotoks[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Manitoba” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#FAF7F2″ use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#F9BAA9″ icon_placement=”left” content_max_width_tablet=”” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_blurb_content=”font-weight: 400;” locked=”off”]

Winnipeg

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Saskatchewan” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#FAF7F2″ use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#F9BAA9″ icon_placement=”left” content_max_width_tablet=”” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_blurb_content=”font-weight: 400;” locked=”off”]

Saskatoon

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”50px” header_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”40px” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Dried Flowers

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Canada” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#FAF7F2″ use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#F9BAA9″ icon_placement=”left” content_max_width_tablet=”” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_blurb_content=”font-weight: 400;” locked=”off”]

A flat rate of $20 applies for shipping

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”United States” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#FAF7F2″ use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#F9BAA9″ icon_placement=”left” content_max_width_tablet=”” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” custom_css_blurb_content=”font-weight: 400;” locked=”off”]

A flat rate of $30 applies.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
